titles: The bow, or, The lamentation of David over Saul and Jonathan, applyed to the royal and blessed martyr, K. Charles the I in a sermon preached the 30th of January, at the Cathedral Church of S. Peter in Exon / by Arth. Bury ...
author: Bury, Arthur, 1624-1713.
notes: "Published to stop the mouth of calumny"
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
